The recognised features are: modification by an adjective (AdjMod), modification by a noun in genitive (NGenMod), coordination with a noun (NCoord) and linking to a verb as its subject (VSubj).;2014;toolService;http://hdl.handle.net/11321/33;pol;downloadable_files_count: 0;Wrocław University of Technology;http://www.clarin-pl.eu/vector-extractor/

notes: Collocations presented are based on co-occurrences of a selected noun with several features describing it and linked with it by syntactic dependencies. The recognised features are: modification by an adjective (AdjMod), modification by a noun in genitive (NGenMod), coordination with a noun (NCoord) and linking to a verb as its subject (VSubj).
title: Vector Extractor
